|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = U.FL |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 3 |rxchains = 3 |sstreams = 3 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam = <!-- AC-qam --> |802.11ac = 1300 |802.11n = 450 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== {{see also|SparkLAN|QCA}}
===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9880 :‧ Standard: 802.11ac/an (5GHz) 3T3R MIMO :‧ Data rate up to 1.3Gbps (VHT MCS9) :‧ Supports 20/40/80MHz and 256-QAM :‧ Antenna: 3x U.FL connectors :‧ Enhanced wireless security: 64/128-bits WEP, WPA, WPA2, 802.1x :‧ Interface: PCI Express; support Linux
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan501.html On '''EmbeddedWorks'''] ([http://site.embeddedworks.net/_ewdownloads/wlan501/wlan501_WPEA-351AC_datasheet_v1.2.pdf datasheet]) *[https://www.everythingrf.com/products/rf-modules/sparklan/528-872-wpea-351ac On '''EverythingRF'''] ([https://www.everythingrf.com/search/rf-modules/filters?page=1&country=global&manuid=;872; modules]) ([http://archive.is/AKUWK ac])
